def: A dark variety of sandstone, much used for building purposes.
The quality or state of being treble; as, the trebleness oftones. Bacon.
A complex nitrogenous hydrocarbon obtained artificially (as bythe action of cyanogen chloride on aniline) as a white, crystallinesubstance; -- called also diphenyl guanidin.
Pish! pooch! -- an exclamation used as an expression ofcontempt, disdain, dislike, etc. [Written also psha.]
A long, low war galley used by the Neapolitans and Sicilians inthe early part of the nineteenth century.
Having eyes affected by the moon; moonblind; dim-eyed;purblind.

Of or pertaining to the order of plants (Piperace√¶) of whichthe pepper (Piper nigrum) is the type. There are about a dozen generaand a thousand species, mostly tropical plants with pungent andaromatic qualities.
The act of asserting one's self, or one's own rights or claims;the quality of being self-asserting.
